summary: Completed comprehensive testing of UI cleanup and PDF generation features. All requested features are working correctly including white sidebar icons, hidden Emergent badge, custom tile sizes, SR NO. reset per location, and GST empty state placeholder text.
passed_tests: API Health Check - Backend is responsive
Custom Tile Creation - POST /api/tiles works with custom sizes
Custom Tile Persistence - GET /api/tiles shows custom sizes
Invoice Creation with Multiple Locations - Kitchen and Bathroom locations created
GST Empty State - gst_percent=0 configured correctly for placeholder text
UI: Sidebar Icons White When Active - rgb(255, 255, 255) confirmed
UI: Emergent Badge Hidden - No 'Made with Emergent' text visible
UI: Tiles Management Text Input - Size field is text input, not dropdown
UI: Custom Tile Size Creation - 900x1800mm tile created and persists
UI: Navigation and Interactions - All buttons clickable and responsive
